title: White House releases Christmas music playlists
paragraphs: If you find yourself with dead air at a Christmas gathering, the White House has a few holiday playlists it hopes might come in handy.
The White House on Wednesday released a pair of Christmas-themed playlists, one each from the Obamas and the Bidens, available on Spotify.

Wednesday’s playlists were the latest entries in the White House’s ongoing use of the music-streaming service. In August, the White House launched an official Spotify channel and posted more than three hours’ worth of music.
Read more: Barack Obama releases a Spotify #POTUSPlaylist
The Holiday playlists offer a range of Christmas tracks, with the Obamas pulling everything from Frank Sinatra to Destiny’s Child and the Bidens running the gamut from Neil Diamond to Coldplay.
Related: First Family lights the National Christmas Tree
